Title: Prohibits the state university of New York from contracting out certain services
Summary: Prohibits the state university of New York from contracting out to the ground lessee or any subsidiary of the ground lessee or the research foundation for the state university of New York for any services or privatize any services currently being performed by employees in the unclassified service at the state university of New York at Albany.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 670 of the laws of 2024 relating to authorizing the lease of certain lands for the Albany NanoTech Complex, in relation to prohibiting the state university of New York from contracting out certain services
